history.proof: induction l as [| x l IHl]. - simpl. srun best use: Rmult_0_l. - simpl. rewrite IHl. hauto lq: on use: Rmult_0_l, Rmult_comm, Rplus_comm, Rmult_1_r, Rmult_plus_distr_l, Rplus_0_r unfold: INR inv: nat.

ctx: induction l as [| x l IHl].
exceptions.exn: Wrong bullet -: Current bullet - is not finished.

ctx: induction l as [| x l IHl].
exceptions.exn: In environment I : Type x : I l : seq I a : R IHl : iter Rplus 0 l (fun _ : I => a) = INR (length l) * a Unable to unify "match length l with | 0%nat => 1 | S _ => INR (length l) + 1 end * a" with "a + INR (length l) * a".

original: induction l as [| x l IHl]. - simpl. auto. - simpl. rewrite IHl. reflexivity.
